headline: Delayed and Cancelled Flights Are Piling Up
summary: Flight cancellations are piling up ahead of the looming winter storm.  As of Friday afternoon, more than 560 flights in or out of U.S. airports were canceled, according to flight-data provider FlightAware.  For Saturday, more than 2,300 flights have been preemptively cancelled, and almost 1,600 for Sunday.

headline: Flights Cancellations Mount Ahead of Winter Storm
summary: As of Friday morning, more than 450 flights in or out of U.S. airports were canceled, according to flight-data provider FlightAware.  American Airlines has already canceled more than 500 of its own flights on Saturday, accounting for nearly a fifth of its scheduled itineraries that day.  Regional carriers Envoy Air and PSA Airlines, which operate American-branded flights, have canceled nearly 400 flights as well.

headline: Nvidia stock pops on H200 China reports, Capital One buys Brex
summary: Morning Brief host Julie Hyman and Yahoo Finance Markets and Data Editor Jared Blikre track several of Friday's top trending stock tickers, including Nvidia (NVDA); Capital One (COF); Brex (BREX.PVT); and airline stocks, such as Delta (DAL), American (AAL), United (UAL), JetBlue (JBLU), Alaska (ALK), and Southwest (LUV). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: ‘Signs of Resilience’: J.P. Morgan Says the Macro Is Holding Up – and Likes These 2 Stocks
summary: With more than halfway through January already behind us, investors are taking stock of a year that repeatedly challenged consensus thinking. Throughout 2025, markets were forced to navigate an unusually noisy macro backdrop, where policy headlines, trade frictions, and shifting growth expectations kept volatility elevated and confidence in check. headline: Airlines cancel hundreds of flights as massive winter storm sweeps across U.S.
summary: U.S. airlines canceled flights and waived change fees for travelers as a cold snap and massive winter storm were forecast to sweep across the country.

raw.headline: Airlines cancel hundreds of flights as massive winter storm sweeps across U.S.
